Name: Splash
About the game: You are a sheep enjoying your meadow when a herd of other sheep come by and try to take over. Do you have what it takes to survive against the waves of sheep trying to take you out with their water balloons? Splash is a fast-paced arcade-style game where you try to withstand waves of enemies and rack up a highscore bigger than all of your friends. All while listening to a killer 80s synth-soundtrack by legendary Koto. Features Fast-paced arcade-style gameplay! Finetuned controls and physics! Three amazing 80s synth-tracks by legendary Koto! Rack up the biggest highscore! 100% Free!
